item.title: Resumé & Work History
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: For better or worse, this is my complete professional work history. I’ve long wanted to keep a single, detailed list of all the various positions I’ve held and projects I’ve participated in over my 35 year working history, here it is! Professional Experience 2011-2017: Technical Software Director, Energy Solutions, Oakland CA Consulting and Development Services: Architect and principal developer of firm’s first commercial product, specifically on behalf of nationwide utility rebate incentive processing (Python).

item.title: About
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: My name is Péter Böröcz. I’m an actively retired technology manager and software developer. Detailed Background You can view my detailed resumé/curriculm vitae here Content Content on this site is broken down into a few different sections based on my interests and activities: Writing Both short and long form commentary about current events, changes in the world since my early working days or projects I’m working on. These are broken down into the following areas:
